parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain tensioner can cause catastrophic engine failure, leading to sudden loss of power, stalling, or complete engine failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: engine revving up even when the foot is not on the gas pedal

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the camshaft adjuster/cam guide can cause catastrophic engine failure, leading to sudden loss of power, stalling, or complete engine failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: engine revving up even when the foot is not on the gas pedal

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the valve spring can cause catastrophic engine failure, leading to sudden loss of power, stalling, or complete engine failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: engine revving up even when the foot is not on the gas pedal

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission can cause sudden loss of power, stalling, or complete transmission failure, which can result in accidents or leave the driver stranded.
The failure of the timing chain tensioner can cause engine failure, leading to a loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially catastrophic consequences.
symptoms: timing chain coming off the guides

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the transmission synchro can cause difficulty shifting gears, leading to loss of vehicle control, accidents, and potentially catastrophic consequences.
symptoms: Crunching or grinding noise when shifting into 2nd and 3rd gear
causing the vehicle to move when not under acceleration.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the timing chain can cause catastrophic engine failure, leading to bent valves, scored cylinder walls, and other serious damage. This can result in costly repairs, loss of vehicle control, and potential accidents.
symptoms: Timing chain rattle upon starting the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of Plastic Timing Chain Guides and Adjusters
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the plastic timing chain guides and adjusters can cause the timing chain to skip teeth, leading to catastrophic engine failure, bent valves, scored cylinder walls, and other serious damage.
symptoms: Timing chain rattle upon starting the engine

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Audi's claim of "lifetime" components, such as the timing chain guides and adjusters, can lead to a false sense of security for vehicle owners, resulting in delayed or neglected maintenance and potential catastrophic engine failure.
symptoms: Timing chain rattle upon starting the engine
